summary: Javier, a thirty-year-old doctor, is about to travel to Miami to meet again with María, his wife, until she calls him to confess that he has fallen in love with another and that the ... See full summary »
cast: Diego Peretti|Soledad Villamil|Cecilia Dopazo|Marcos Mundstock|Hernán Jiménez|Mariana Briski|Roly Serrano|Ricardo Merkin|Silvia Baylé|Luis Brandoni|Nilda Raggi|Eugenia Tobal|Bernarda Pagés|Natália Grimberg|Alberto Suarez|Lionel Campoy|Tomás Kuperman|Mara Jimenez do brito|Alberto Iaccarino|Gabriela Faccennini|Patricia Rigueira|Carlos Balduzzi|Daniel Vazquez|Diego Cosín|Daniel Gimelberg|Florencia Polimeni|Diana Kapustin|Fabio Cimmarusti|Rosana Martín|Alejandro Di Michele|Ester Luján|Silvana Sosto|Carolina Martín|Enrique Amadasi|Agustín Márquez|Mariana Amondarain|Carolina Schatz|Jorge Montenegro|Marco Iaccarino|Francisco Musaluppi|Laila Freidenberg|Sergio Cingolani|Nicolás Casares|Valentina Llorens
title: No sos vos, soy yo
